Based on your preferences, I would recommend "The Imitation Game." This film is a historical drama that stars Benedict Cumberbatch as Alan Turing, the English mathematic genius who helped break the German Enigma code during World War II.

"The Imitation Game" is based on the book "The Imitation Game: The Great Code of WWII" by Andrew Ross. The film follows Alan Turing and his team at the University of Manchester in England in 1937, as they try to crack the German Enigma code, which helps Germany gain an advantage over their opponents during World War II.

"The Imitation Game" was released on February 28, 2014. The film received positive reviews from critics and audiences alike.
